description: A slide show on the Leopard at des Artistes, a renovation of the old Café des Artistes and the subject of this week’s restaurant review.
title: The New York Times
title_page: Leopard at des Artistes - NYC - Slide Show - The New York Times
text:
The subject of this week’s restaurant review is the Leopard at des Artistes, a renovation of the old Café des Artistes. It comes from the same team that has Il Gattopardo on West 54th Street, and shares some of that restaurant’s grown-up, affluent charm.
Go read all about it. Comment below if you have been there and have something to say about the food or the space.
But the real subject of this week’s blog discussion is readers’ memories of the original Café des Artistes, which the restaurateur George Lang purchased in 1975 and transformed into one of the city’s most romantic and enduring restaurants.
Did you ever go? Share your memories of Café des Artistes in the comments below. Bonus points for stories involving affairs to remember, and of course famous people and how they behaved.
